original_title: 3 ŽENE or (waking up from my Bosnian Dream)
overview: Ivana, Clara and Marina are three women from different backgrounds living at the same time in Sarajevo. Ivana dreams about moving to the USA, Clara works during the night to save money for her studies and Marina is in love with her best friend who is moving to a different country. Each one fights to achieve her own goals, but most of the time society doesn´t accept what's not in accordance with its norms.
title: 3 Women or Waking Up from My Bosnian Dream
